items.sentence: You\'re the one who said you wanted to talk.
The hallway is slippery, so watch your step.
Tom looks like he\'s put on a little weight.
I don\'t think there\'s anything in the box.
Tom doesn\'t take very good care of his dog.
I\'m going to play tennis with Tom tomorrow.
I\'m going to stay in Boston for a few days.
I\'m having a wonderful time here in Boston.
I\'m interested in the history of Australia.
Don\'t you ever do anything other than read?
Is that the only reason you don\'t like Tom?
Tom didn\'t buy everything he needed to buy.
Tom didn\'t come here alone tonight, did he?
Tom didn\'t come home from school yesterday.
Tom didn\'t do what he promised he would do.
Tom didn\'t even offer Mary a cup of coffee.
Don\'t forget to put a stamp on your letter.
Tom said he needed my help, so I helped him.
Tom said he planned on doing that on Monday.
Tom said he thought Mary would be back soon.
